quote1: To be, or not to be: that is the question.
quote2: All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players.
quote3: A horse! a horse! my kingdom for a horse!
quote4: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.
quote5: Good night, good night! Parting is such sweet sorrow.
quote6: La personne nie trop farouchement pour être crédible, me semble-t-il.
quote7: Now is the winter of our discontent.
quote8: If music be the food of love, play on.
quote9: The course of true love never did run smooth.
quote10: Out, out brief candle! Life's but a walking shadow.
